comments.body:
`==1387==ERROR: AddressSanitizer: stack-buffer-overflow on address  at pc  bp  sp 
WRITE of size 1 at  thread T0
    #0  in void tflite::reference_integer_ops::Softmax<signed char>(tflite::SoftmaxParams const&, tflite::RuntimeShape const&, signed char const*, tflite::RuntimeShape const&, signed char*) third_party/tensorflow/lite/kernels/internal/reference/integer_ops/softmax.h:93:36
    #1  in tflite::ops::micro::activations::Softmax2DQuantized(TfLiteTensor const*, TfLiteTensor*, TfLiteSoftmaxParams*, tflite::ops::micro::activations::(anonymous namespace)::OpData*) third_party/tensorflow/lite/micro/kernels/softmax.cc:154:7
    #2  in tflite::ops::micro::activations::SoftmaxEval(TfLiteContext*, TfLiteNode*) third_party/tensorflow/lite/micro/kernels/softmax.cc:233:9
    #3  in tflite::testing::(anonymous namespace)::TestSoftmaxQuantizedSigned(std::initializer_list<int>, std::initializer_list<signed char>, float, float, std::initializer_list<signed char>, std::initializer_list<int>, float, float, signed char*) third_party/tensorflow/lite/micro/kernels/softmax_test.cc:212:3
    #4  in main third_party/tensorflow/lite/micro/kernels/softmax_test.cc:366:3
    #5  in __libc_start_main (/usr/grte/v4/lib64/libc.so.6+0x38bbc)
    #6  in _start /usr/grte/v4/debug-src/src/csu/../sysdeps/x86_64/start.S:108

Address  is located in stack of thread T0 at offset 565 in frame
    #0  in main third_party/tensorflow/lite/micro/kernels/softmax_test.cc:225
`

We have been trying to move away from using F2Q* in favor of CreateQuantizedTensor (see conv_test.cc).  I realize that the rest of this file uses F2Q and F2Qs, so we can leave it as-is.  Just a note for future changes.
